# 0xRulCTF
0xRUL{FIND_THE_FLAG_HERE}

user@kacang:~# compress a secret file multiple times and only provide with `ROT13` shifted `hexdump` footprint. 
As a forensic investigator your task is too decipher and find secret with available clue.

To start this challenge. Use git clone to clone this repository.
`git clone github.com/Craglitch/0xRulCTF`

### Rule
- Don't use AI
- Don't ask other competitor
- You can work as a team with 3 people
- Deadline are 14 december
### Task
- Decipher the message
- Found the filetype
- Capture the flag

### Clue given : 
